This is a small arcade game about the ball in space. You have to find a way out of different mazes that are in space, but exactly in space!
The game offers a diverse and amazing levels, you'll be able to go through them all?

Package size: 100 MB - More storage space required for install

Compatibility information:
Number of players for local play: 1 Player

Supported interfaces/sensors
- Touchscreen
- Controller / On-screen controller
- Motion sensor

Supported languages:
English(United States)

cavebrave
